verbose_text: TNF-alpha decreases insulin mediated tyrosine phosphorylation of insulin receptor (IR) and inhibits the tyrosine kinase activity of the insulin receptor through IRS-1 serine phosphorylation (Ser residue 312 in human or 307 in rat) [XREF_BIBR], thereby converting IRS-1 into an inhibitor of the insulin receptor [XREF_BIBR - XREF_BIBR].
evidence: IR) and inhibits the tyrosine kinase activity of the insulin receptor
